options.description: Optional reconstruction options to use during reconstruction.

total_images.title: Total Images
total_images.description: Total number of input images considered for this reconstruction run.

registered_images.title: Registered Images
registered_images.description: Number of images successfully registered into the final model.

registration_rate.title: Registration Rate
registration_rate.description: Registration rate in percent: 100 × (registered_images / total_images). Computed after selecting the best reconstruction (max registered images).

num_3d_points.title: Num 3D Points
num_3d_points.description: Count of 3D points in the selected 'best' reconstruction.

average_keypoints_per_image.title: Average Keypoints Per Image
average_keypoints_per_image.description: Average number of detected keypoints per image (after SuperPoint extraction), computed across all images.

reprojection_pixel_error_50th_percentile.title: Reprojection Pixel Error 50Th Percentile
reprojection_pixel_error_50th_percentile.description: Median (50th percentile) reprojection error in pixels across all valid 2D observations in registered images, measured using image.project_point(point3D.xyz) vs. observed 2D keypoint.

reprojection_pixel_error_90th_percentile.title: Reprojection Pixel Error 90Th Percentile
reprojection_pixel_error_90th_percentile.description: 90th percentile reprojection error in pixels across all valid 2D observations, computed the same way as the median.

track_length_50th_percentile.title: Track Length 50Th Percentile
track_length_50th_percentile.description: Median (50th percentile) track length across 3D points in the selected model. Track length = number of distinct images observing the point.

percent_tracks_with_length_greater_than_.title: Percent Tracks With Length Greater Than Or Equal To 3
percent_tracks_with_length_greater_than_.description: Percentage of 3D points whose track length is ≥ 3 (a common robustness threshold). Computed as 100 × (#points with length≥3 / #points).

all_verified_matches.title: All Verified Matches
all_verified_matches.description: Total number of verified matches across all image pairs.

all_verified_match_rate.title: All Verified Match Rate
all_verified_match_rate.description: Percentage of verified matches across all image pairs.

all_verified_match_inliers_mean.title: All Verified Match Inliers Mean
all_verified_match_inliers_mean.description: Mean number of inliers for all verified matches.

all_verified_match_inliers_median.title: All Verified Match Inliers Median
all_verified_match_inliers_median.description: Median number of inliers for all verified matches.

stereo_verified_matches.title: Stereo Verified Matches
stereo_verified_matches.description: Number of verified matches for stereo pairs (same frame, different sensors).

stereo_verified_match_rate.title: Stereo Verified Match Rate
stereo_verified_match_rate.description: Percentage of verified matches for stereo pairs.

stereo_verified_match_inliers_mean.title: Stereo Verified Match Inliers Mean
stereo_verified_match_inliers_mean.description: Mean number of inliers for verified matches for stereo pairs.

stereo_verified_match_inliers_median.title: Stereo Verified Match Inliers Median
stereo_verified_match_inliers_median.description: Median number of inliers for verified matches for stereo pairs.

same_sensor_verified_matches.title: Same Sensor Verified Matches
same_sensor_verified_matches.description: Number of verified matches for same-sensor pairs (across frames).

same_sensor_verified_match_rate.title: Same Sensor Verified Match Rate
same_sensor_verified_match_rate.description: Percentage of verified matches for same-sensor pairs.

same_sensor_verified_match_inliers_mean.title: Same Sensor Verified Match Inliers Mean
same_sensor_verified_match_inliers_mean.description: Mean number of inliers for verified matches for same-sensor pairs.

same_sensor_verified_match_inliers_media.title: Same Sensor Verified Match Inliers Median
same_sensor_verified_match_inliers_media.description: Median number of inliers for verified matches for same-sensor pairs.

cross_sensor_verified_matches.title: Cross Sensor Verified Matches
cross_sensor_verified_matches.description: Number of verified matches for cross-sensor pairs (across frames).

cross_sensor_verified_match_rate.title: Cross Sensor Verified Match Rate
cross_sensor_verified_match_rate.description: Percentage of verified matches for cross-sensor pairs.

cross_sensor_verified_match_inliers_mean.title: Cross Sensor Verified Match Inliers Mean
cross_sensor_verified_match_inliers_mean.description: Mean number of inliers for verified matches for cross-sensor pairs.

cross_sensor_verified_match_inliers_medi.title: Cross Sensor Verified Match Inliers Median
cross_sensor_verified_match_inliers_medi.description: Median number of inliers for verified matches for cross-sensor pairs.

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Random seed to use (for deterministic behavior).

single_threaded.title: Single Threaded
single_threaded.description: If true, run reconstruction in single-threaded mode (for deterministic behavior).

neighbors_count.title: Neighbors Count
neighbors_count.description: How many pose-nearest neighbors to consider when generating image pairs. Use -1 for exhaustive matching (all pairs). If None, a sensible default is used (currently 12). Smaller values reduce weak overlaps and speed up matching at the cost of some coverage.

rotation_threshold.title: Rotation Threshold
rotation_threshold.description: Rotation angle threshold (degrees) for considering two images as neighbors when generating image pairs. Smaller values reduce weak overlaps and speed up matching at the cost of some coverage.

max_keypoints_per_image.title: Max Keypoints Per Image
max_keypoints_per_image.description: Upper bound on detected local features per image (SuperPoint). Reduces descriptor/match volume and downstream 3D points; too small can hurt registration.

ransac_max_error.title: Ransac Max Error
ransac_max_error.description: Two-view RANSAC inlier threshold (pixels) used by verify_matches(). Lower = stricter inlier test; removes borderline correspondences before SfM.

ransac_min_inlier_ratio.title: Ransac Min Inlier Ratio
ransac_min_inlier_ratio.description: Two-view RANSAC minimum inlier ratio to accept the model. Higher = reject more weak pairs; typically 0.10–0.20 for stricter matching.

use_prior_position.title: Use Prior Position
use_prior_position.description: If true, use position priors during registration. This leverages PosePrior(position=...) written into the database to guide image registration.

rig_verification.title: Rig Verification
rig_verification.description: If true, perform rig-based verification during feature matching and two-view geometry verification. Requires images to be tagged with rig/camera IDs.

triangulation_minimum_angle.title: Triangulation Minimum Angle
triangulation_minimum_angle.description: Minimum triangulation angle (degrees). Applied at creation time (triangulation.min_angle) and again during mapper filtering (mapper.filter_min_tri_angle). Raising it removes low-parallax points.

triangulation_complete_max_reprojection_.title: Triangulation Complete Max Reprojection Error
triangulation_complete_max_reprojection_.description: Triangulation-time gate (pixels) for COMPLETING tracks into new 3D points (triangulation.complete_max_reproj_error). Lower → fewer borderline new points.

triangulation_merge_max_reprojection_err.title: Triangulation Merge Max Reprojection Error
triangulation_merge_max_reprojection_err.description: Triangulation-time gate (pixels) for MERGING near-duplicate 3D points (triangulation.merge_max_reproj_error). Lower → fewer merges; higher → more aggressive deduplication.

mapper_filter_max_reprojection_error.title: Mapper Filter Max Reprojection Error
mapper_filter_max_reprojection_error.description: Mapper-level **post-BA outlier** threshold (pixels) (mapper.filter_max_reproj_error). Points exceeding this after local/global BA are culled. This is NOT a triangulation accept threshold.

bundle_adjustment_refine_sensor_from_rig.title: Bundle Adjustment Refine Sensor From Rig
bundle_adjustment_refine_sensor_from_rig.description: If true, refine per-camera extrinsics within the rig during BA (ba_refine_sensor_from_rig). Useful when rig calibration is approximate.

bundle_adjustment_refine_focal_length.title: Bundle Adjustment Refine Focal Length
bundle_adjustment_refine_focal_length.description: If true, refine the camera focal length during BA (ba_refine_focal_length).

bundle_adjustment_refine_principal_point.title: Bundle Adjustment Refine Principal Point
bundle_adjustment_refine_principal_point.description: If true, refine the camera principal point during BA (ba_refine_principal_point).

bundle_adjustment_refine_additional_para.title: Bundle Adjustment Refine Additional Params
bundle_adjustment_refine_additional_para.description: If true, refine model-specific additional parameters during BA (ba_refine_extra_params), e.g., radial/tangential distortion where applicable.

compression_opq_number_of_subvectors.title: Compression Opq Number Of Subvectors
compression_opq_number_of_subvectors.description: Number of subvectors for OPQ compression.

compression_opq_number_of_bits_per_subve.title: Compression Opq Number Of Bits Per Subvector
compression_opq_number_of_bits_per_subve.description: Number of bits per subvector for OPQ compression.

compression_opq_number_of_training_itera.title: Compression Opq Number Of Training Iterations
compression_opq_number_of_training_itera.description: Number of training iterations for OPQ compression.

pose_prior_position_sigma_m.title: Pose Prior Position Sigma M
pose_prior_position_sigma_m.description: Standard deviation (meters) for position priors when writing PosePrior to the database. Smaller values = stronger priors.
